About

This is who I am.

I am a husband and recently became a father.

I am a software engineer for Primex Inc. living in Madison, WI.

I develop web applications primarily for the cloud using AWS and Ruby on Rails.

I have worked remotely since 2013.

I hold degrees in Mathematics and Computer Science from Frostburg State University in Frostburg, MD.
